title: Single Number
algorithmDescription: Find element appearing once when all others appear twice using XOR
detailedDescription: Given array where every element appears twice except one, find that single element. Input: First line has n. Second line has n integers. Output: The single number. Use XOR properties: a XOR a = 0, a XOR 0 = a. Must use O(1) space.
hints: XOR of two same numbers is 0
XOR of number with 0 is the number itself
XOR all elements: pairs cancel out, single remains
solutionApproach: Initialize result=0. XOR result with each array element. All pairs cancel to 0, leaving only the single number. Return result. One pass, O(1) space.
testCaseCriteria: Must use O(1) space. Should demonstrate XOR technique. Works for any value as single number.
